video.heading: Te acompanamos en el camino
video.subheading: Sabemos que vienes de lejos y queremos que tu llegada sea facil.
video.message: Entendemos que vienes de lejos. Si necesitas ayuda para llegar a Newry, estaremos encantados de ayudarte.

en.title: Transport
en.description: Buses and transfers for the day.
en.metaDescription: Buses and transfers for the day.
en.note: We will share more information soon.

video.heading: We are with you on the way
video.subheading: We know you are coming from far away and want your arrival to be easy.
video.message: We understand you are traveling from far away. If you need help getting to Newry, we will be happy to assist.
